author: bago
msg: Further mimemessage handling optimisation conservative changes (not a code revert, but a logical revert) (JAMES-559)
It seems to work even without this change because of a weird behaviour of MimeMessage.saveChanges in Sun Javamail.

author: jmsnell
msg: Making it easier to get the value of a simple extension
ExtensibleElemenet.getSimpleExtension(qname) will return the string value of the extension
